data.comment: [59] spectators have come along to [24] today.
Today's referee, Deniz Aytekin, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Deniz Aytekin, has blown to start the match.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Schalke.
Schalke's Daniel Caligiuri gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
Thorgan Hazard for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Dortmund.
Deniz Aytekin awards Schalke a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Throw-in Dortmund.
Deniz Aytekin awards the away team a throw-in.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a Dortmund throw-in in Schalke's half.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Dortmund just outside Schalke's area.
Dortmund push forward at Signal Iduna Park and Achraf Hakimi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
Erling Haaland of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
Schalke pushes forward through Daniel Caligiuri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Deniz Aytekin signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to Dortmund's area.
Erling Haaland is on target to give Dortmund a 1-0 advantage.
Thorgan Hazard with an assist there.
Schalke are caught offside.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Dortmund are pushing forward but Raphael Guerreiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Jean-Clair Todibo is back on the pitch.
Jean-Clair Todibo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Deniz Aytekin signals a Schalke throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
In Dortmund Schalke's Amine Harit is caught offside.
Dortmund drive upfield and Achraf Hakimi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Important block from the Schalke defence as Mahmoud Dahoud fires in a strike for Dortmund.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
Deniz Aytekin awards Schalke a goal kick.
Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
At Signal Iduna Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Dortmund.
Raphael Guerreiro puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Julian Brandt instrumental with a fine assist.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Wagner (Schalke) is making a first substitution, with Rabbi Matondo replacing Benito Raman.
David Wagner is making the team's second substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Guido Burgstaller replacing Jean-Clair Todibo.
Schalke's Suat Serdar is on target but unsuccessful.
Salif Sane (Schalke) gets a yellow card.
Great finish from Thorgan Hazard to give Dortmund a 3-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Julian Brandt.
The match at Signal Iduna Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Erling Haaland, who is down injured.
Schalke drive forward but Guido Burgstaller is judged offside.
Bastian Oczipka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Schalke.
Erling Haaland returns to the field for Dortmund after picking up a slight injury.
Schalke push upfield but Deniz Aytekin quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Dortmund.
Jonjoe Kenny (Schalke) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Deniz Aytekin signals a free kick to Schalke.
Thomas Delaney (Dortmund) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Deniz Aytekin awards the home team a throw-in.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Schalke drives forward and Guido Burgstaller gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Schalke.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Goal! Dortmund extend their lead to 4-0 through Raphael Guerreiro.
Great play from Erling Haaland to set up the goal.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
Leonardo Balerdi is replacing Thomas Delaney for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Weston McKennie (Schalke) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick in a good position for Schalke!
Schalke are coming forward and Guido Burgstaller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dortmund.
Deniz Aytekin awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Dortmund in Dortmund.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Lukasz Piszczek (Dortmund) has received a yellow card from Deniz Aytekin.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Deniz Aytekin.
Salif Sane (Schalke) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
The away team have replaced Suat Serdar with Alessandro Schopf. This is the third substitution made today by David Wagner.
Throw-in Schalke.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
The away team replace Daniel Caligiuri with Juan Miranda.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
Attention is being given to Dortmundâ€™s Thorgan Hazard and play has been suspended briefly.
Thorgan Hazard, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jadon Sancho is the substitute for Dortmund.
Dortmund needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rabbi Matondo for Schalke has been booked by Deniz Aytekin and receives a first yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Dortmund to check on Achraf Hakimi, who is grimacing with pain.
Achraf Hakimi for Dortmund is back on the field again.
Timo Becker is replacing Jonjoe Kenny for the away team.
Mario Gotze is on a sub for Mahmoud Dahoud for Dortmund.
The home team have replaced Raphael Guerreiro with Schmelzer,Marcel. This is the fourth substitution made today by Lucien Favre.
Schalke's [49] misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dortmund.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Dortmund.
Corner awarded to Schalke.
Deniz Aytekin signals a Schalke throw-in in Dortmund's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-0.
